review: Dayz - zombies + russians= Survival: Postapocalypse Now
The artwork and the sounds are amazing! An amazing game!
From BROBOCOP to an Indiana Jones rip off you will have a 11/10 experience murcelessly killling people while screaming, 'MURICA F$%# YEA'
Awesome I love it to bits, I wish people were more Friendly, Would save me alot of times saying *are you friendly*?
